author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
From Baer, a message of woe doth come,
Profit's expectations reduced, the numbers hum,
A rise in provisions, the tax rate high,
Leaves last year's gains to simply die.

In BTP-Bund spread, room doth shrink,
As Moody's view makes investors think,
Italy's outlook improved from bad,
Favors short-term tightening, a trend to be had.

Altman, the one who led OpenAI,
His return thwarted, bids goodbye,
The board that fired him, now instead,
Shear, of Twitch, the helm will tread.

feedItems.title: Julius Baer Cuts Profit Expectations
feedItems.description: Julius Baer said it expected 2023 net profit to be below last year’s level due to a rise in credit provisions and an increased tax rate.

feedItems.title: Limited Room Seen for BTP-Bund Spread to Tighten After Moody's Improved Italy's Outlook
feedItems.description: Moody’s Investors Service’s upgrade of the outlook on Italy’s Baa3 rating to stable from negative favors some further short-term tightening dynamics for Italian government bonds, Morgan Stanley Research said.

feedItems.title: Sam Altman Not Returning as CEO of OpenAI
feedItems.description: Sam Altman’s bid to return to OpenAI faltered, as the board that fired him opted not to agree to proposed terms of his reinstatement. Emmett Shear, former CEO of Twitch, was named interim CEO.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In market's land where fortunes lie bare,
USD/JPY's strength doth wane, traders beware.
Mid-winter's rise, now faint and rare,
A warning from Oanda, prudence they declare.

Nikkei, bold market of the rising sun’s might,
Did tumble, upon the yen's stalwart fight.
Profit taken, a high pierced through night,
In 33 splendid years, a fretful sight.

Sky sailors face a woeful task,
NASA, their signal thread grows thin as flask.
Deep Space Network, in burden aghast,
As moon wards we yearn, the future vast.

feedItems.title: USD/JPY's Medium-Term Uptrend in Jeopardy, Oanda Says
feedItems.description: USD/JPY’s medium-term uptrend since mid-January is in jeopardy, based on technical analysis, Oanda said.

feedItems.title: Nikkei Falls 0.6% on Likely Profit-Taking, JPY Strength
feedItems.description: Japan’s Nikkei Stock Average fell 0.6% to close at 33388.03 on likely profit-taking after earlier hitting a 33-year high.

feedItems.title: NASA Has an Infrastructure Problem. Here's Why It Matters.
feedItems.description: The Deep Space Network, NASA’s main communications infrastructure, is overburdened. That’s raising concerns about the network’s ability to support future missions, as NASA pivots toward extended human exploration of the moon.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In Wall Street's great and noble hall,
Haley's bid they do enthrall,
Against the Trump, she stakes her claim,
A wine of change in political game.

In far off lands of Arab sands and Western clime,
Upon Gaza strife they seek to chime,
The strong mead of leadership they wish to pour,
Yet on whom to bestow, they find no sure.

In Maui's land of sun and surf,
Descends a fire of destructive turf,
Compensation's ale offered, victims spurn,
Till accountability's toast, they yearn to earn.

feedItems.title: Big hitters on Wall Street are lining up to support Nikki Haley's long-shot bid to snatch the 2024 Republican presidential nomination from Donald Trump.
feedItems.description: Big hitters on Wall Street are lining up to support Nikki Haley’s long-shot bid to snatch the 2024 Republican presidential nomination from Donald Trump.

feedItems.title: Most Western and Arab leaders agree they want some form of Palestinian government running the Gaza Strip, but they can't agree on who it should include as they look beyond Israel's war in the enclave.
feedItems.description: Most Western and Arab leaders agree they want some form of Palestinian government running the Gaza Strip, but they can’t agree on who it should include as they look beyond Israel’s war in the enclave.

feedItems.title: Families of some Maui fire victims are criticizing proposed compensation payments as premature, saying accountability is at issue.
feedItems.description: Families of some Maui fire victims are criticizing proposed compensation payments as premature, saying accountability is at issue.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
A snail's lifespan ceased, so too the morn,
Rosalynn Carter, lady, flowers torn.
Gone 'fore songbird in secret glade hath warned,
Silently she falls, into new dawn adorned.

Biden the rabbit, with Netanyahu the goat,
In fields of discord ceaselessly they coax.
Striving to calm Gaza’s feral hound,
Yet only the strain of allies resound.

Javier Milei, the outsider, akin to hare,
Races past the old, in audacious dare.
Pledging to level Argentina's rugged plain,
Elected the leader, in hope they strain.

feedItems.title: Died: Rosalynn Carter, 96, former first lady.
feedItems.description: Died: Rosalynn Carter, 96, former first lady.

feedItems.title: Biden is struggling to persuade Netanyahu to take steps U.S. officials believe could help prevent the conflict in Gaza from further escalating, straining the relationship between the two longtime allies, according to U.S. and European officials.
feedItems.description: Biden is struggling to persuade Netanyahu to take steps U.S. officials believe could help prevent the conflict in Gaza from further escalating, straining the relationship between the two longtime allies, according to U.S. and European officials.

feedItems.title: Javier Milei, a libertarian political outsider who pledged to flatten Argentina's political establishment, was elected president in a major shift for a country in economic straits.
feedItems.description: Javier Milei, a libertarian political outsider who pledged to flatten Argentina’s political establishment, was elected president in a major shift for a country in economic straits.
